Uses of Class
fr.sii.ogham.email.builder.ImageHandlingBuilder

  • Packages that use ImageHandlingBuilder 
    Package Description
    fr.sii.ogham.email.builder  

    • Uses of ImageHandlingBuilder in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder

      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder that return ImageHandlingBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageHandlingBuilder EmailBuilder.images()
      Image handling consists of defining how images are inlined in the email: Either inlining directly in the HTML content by enconding image into base64 string Or attaching the image to the email and referencing it using a Content-ID (CID) Or no inlining For example: .images() .inline() .attach() .cid() .generator(new SequentialIdGenerator()) .and() .and() .base64(); Enables both inlining modes (attaching images and encoding in base64).
      Constructors in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder with parameters of type ImageHandlingBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageInliningBuilder(ImageHandlingBuilder parent, EnvironmentBuilder<?> environmentBuilder)
      Initializes the builder with a parent builder.
